result.title: Claude Code Tutorial #1 - Introduction & Setup

frames.subtitle: All right then gang.
frames.subtitle_translated: 好，各位觀眾。

frames.subtitle: In this course, we're going to be diving into claude code which is an AI powered agentic coding tool created by Enthropic which you can use to analyze, plan, write and edit code within your projects.
frames.subtitle_translated: 在這個課程中，我們將深入探討 Claude Code，這是一個由 Enthropic 開發的 AI 驅動的編碼工具，可用於分析、規劃、編寫和編輯您專案中的程式碼。

frames.subtitle: Similar to other agentic coding tools like copilot or cursor or windsurf.
frames.subtitle_translated: 它類似於其他編碼工具，例如 Copilot、Cursor 或 Windsurf。

frames.subtitle: But whereas those other tools typically come with a user interface embedded within code editors themselves, claude code lives directly in the terminal and we interact with it through the terminal.
frames.subtitle_translated: 但與那些工具通常嵌入在程式碼編輯器中不同，Claude Code 直接存在於終端機中，我們透過終端機與它互動。

frames.subtitle: And that means it can integrate with your existing development workflow a little more seamlessly without forcing you to switch your IDE.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這意味著它可以更無縫地整合到您現有的開發流程中，而無需強制您切換 IDE。

frames.subtitle: On top of that, you can use cloud code within GitHub workflows to automate code reviews on pull requests to provide feedback as well as have it work independently on open issues in your repository.
frames.subtitle_translated: 此外，您還可以使用 Cloud Code 在 GitHub 工作流程中自動化程式碼審查，提供回饋，並使其獨立於儲存庫中的開放問題工作。

frames.subtitle: I also think it sets itself apart in its ability to really understand the codebase of whatever project I use it on.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我也認為它在理解我所使用的專案程式碼庫方面表現出色。

frames.subtitle: And in my own personal experience, I found the code it generates to be more tailored and appropriate on a project by project basis.
frames.subtitle_translated: 根據我個人的經驗，它生成的程式碼更符合專案的實際需求。

frames.subtitle: So, in this series, we'll be diving into how to set up Claude Code on your computer, how to provide it context and learn about your codebase, have it generate code for us in a targeted and specific way, and we'll also set it to work on our GitHub repo to work autonomously on simple issues and books.
frames.subtitle_translated: 在這個系列中，我們將深入探討如何在您的電腦上設定 Claude Code，如何提供給它上下文並了解您的程式碼庫，讓它以有針對性和具體的方式為我們產生程式碼，並設定它在 GitHub 儲存庫中自主地處理簡單問題和書籍。

frames.subtitle: On top of that, we'll be looking at MCP servers to provide additional tools to Claude code, custom commands for common tasks, and we'll even try spinning up a sub agent to work alongside Claude.
frames.subtitle_translated: 此外，我們還將探討 MCP 伺服器，以提供額外的工具給 Claude Code，自訂指令來執行常見任務，甚至嘗試啟動一個子代理程式與 Claude 並肩工作。

frames.subtitle: And just to clarify, this will not be a VI coding course where we just let the AI loose to code everything for us.
frames.subtitle_translated: 為了澄清，這不會是一個完全讓 AI 負責編碼的 VI 課程。

frames.subtitle: In my opinion, that's not a productive workflow, and it can lead to more bugs, sloppy code, and technical debt, making the code much harder to maintain in the future.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我認為那樣的工作流程效率不高，可能導致更多錯誤、粗糙的程式碼和技術債務，使程式碼更難以維護。

frames.subtitle: So, we'll be taking a more hands-on approach, coding alongside Claude on tasks and features, which are more narrow and focused in scope, and also checking the work it does as we go.
frames.subtitle_translated: 因此，我們將採取更動手的做法，與 Claude 一起編碼執行任務和功能，這些任務和功能範圍更窄、更具體，同時也會檢查它所做的工作。

frames.subtitle: And I feel this approach generally keeps the code cleaner, less buggy, and I stay fully in the loop and in control, dipping into the code to make manual changes where I need or want to.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我認為這種方法通常能保持程式碼更乾淨、更少錯誤，我能完全參與其中並保持控制，在需要或希望時手動修改程式碼。

frames.subtitle: Anyway, before we do anything, we'll need to install Cloud Code and sign up for a plan.
frames.subtitle_translated: 好了，在開始之前，我們需要安裝 Cloud Code 並註冊方案。

frames.subtitle: [Music] Okay, then.
frames.subtitle_translated: [音樂] 好的，開始吧。

frames.subtitle: So, I'm on the Cloud Code homepage, and if you scroll down a little bit, you're eventually going to see an npm command we can run to install it on our computer.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我現在在 Cloud Code 首頁，如果您向下滾動一點，最終會看到一個 npm 指令，我們可以執行它來在我們的電腦上安裝它。

frames.subtitle: Now, it used to be that on Windows you would have to install it via WSL, but now you don't have to, and you can just run this command directly in your Windows terminal, so copy that for later.
frames.subtitle_translated: 過去在 Windows 上需要透過 WSL 安裝，但現在不需要，可以直接在 Windows 終端機中執行此指令，稍後複製它。

frames.subtitle: You'll also need to sign up for an account and choose a pricing plan, which you can do right here on the pricing page.
frames.subtitle_translated: 您還需要註冊帳戶並選擇價格方案，您可以在價格頁面中完成。

frames.subtitle: So, you can use Claude Code with a pro plan or a max plan.
frames.subtitle_translated: 您可以使用 Claude Code 的 Pro 方案或 Max 方案。

frames.subtitle: The free plan gives you access to the Claude models on the web and the desktop app, but not Claude Code itself, at least not at the time of recording this video.
frames.subtitle_translated: 免费方案能用網頁和桌面版Claude，但目前沒有Claude Code。

frames.subtitle: The pro plan is $17 a month and for that you get some fairly decent usage limits which reset I think every 5 hours and you do also get a warning when you're nearly reaching your limit.
frames.subtitle_translated: 付費方案每月17美元，提供不錯的使用量上限，大約每5小時重置，並在接近上限時會提醒你。

frames.subtitle: You also get access to more models like Sonic 4 and Opus 4.1 but the Opus model does eat through your limits much faster.
frames.subtitle_translated: 你也能使用更多模型，例如Sonic 4和Opus 4.1，但Opus模型會更快消耗你的額度。

frames.subtitle: You also get access to more models like Sonic 4 and Opus 4.1 but the Opus model does eat through your limits much faster.
frames.subtitle_translated: 你也能使用更多模型，例如Sonic 4和Opus 4.1，但Opus模型會更快消耗你的額度。

frames.subtitle: The Max plan is way more expensive but it gives you more usage and access to all the latest features as they ship.
frames.subtitle_translated: Max方案更貴，但提供更多使用量和所有最新功能。

frames.subtitle: So sign up, choose a plan and then crack open your terminal.
frames.subtitle_translated: 所以註冊、選擇方案，然後打開你的終端機。

frames.subtitle: So sign up, choose a plan and then crack open your terminal.
frames.subtitle_translated: 所以註冊、選擇方案，然後打開你的終端機。

frames.subtitle: So inside a terminal now we want to run that command we just copied npm install g to install this globally atanthropicai/claude code.
frames.subtitle_translated: 現在在終端機裡，我們要執行剛才複製的指令，安裝anthropicai/claude code 全域版本。

frames.subtitle: So press enter to install this.
frames.subtitle_translated: 按Enter鍵來安裝。

frames.subtitle: Okay.
frames.subtitle_translated: 好的。

frames.subtitle: And then the next thing you want to do once you've installed that is navigate to a project that you want to work with claude on.
frames.subtitle_translated: 然後下一步，在你安裝好之後，導航到你想用Claude進行開發的專案。

frames.subtitle: And then the next thing you want to do once you've installed that is navigate to a project that you want to work with claude on.
frames.subtitle_translated: 然後下一步，在你安裝好之後，導航到你想用Claude進行開發的專案。

frames.subtitle: This is what we're going to be using for this course.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這個我們將在課程中使用。

frames.subtitle: This is what we're going to be using for this course.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這個我們將在課程中使用。

frames.subtitle: And this starts up a claude session inside this project for you.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這會在專案中啟動一個Claude Session。

frames.subtitle: Now, when you first start using Claude, the first time you use it, it's going to ask you a few questions.
frames.subtitle_translated: 第一次使用Claude時，它會問你幾個問題。

frames.subtitle: It's going to ask you for a mode.
frames.subtitle_translated: 它會詢問你模式。

frames.subtitle: It's going to ask you for a mode.
frames.subtitle_translated: 它會詢問你模式。

frames.subtitle: And then it's going to say you can log in using the console account, which is API usage, or with a subscription.
frames.subtitle_translated: 然後它會說你可以使用console帳戶登入，這是API使用量，或使用訂閱。

frames.subtitle: Now, I showed you those plans a moment ago, and I've already got a pro subscription.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我之前就跟你展示過這些方案，我已經有Pro訂閱了。

frames.subtitle: So, I'm going to sign up with this sign in rather, and that's going to open a browser for you, which I'm going to authorize off screen.
frames.subtitle_translated: So, I'm going to sign up with this sign in rather, and that's going to open a browser for you, which I'm going to authorize off screen.

frames.subtitle: And now you can see it says login successful.
frames.subtitle_translated: And now you can see it says login successful.

frames.subtitle: Press enter to continue.
frames.subtitle_translated: Press enter to continue.

frames.subtitle: And then it says here Claude can make mistakes.
frames.subtitle_translated: And then it says here Claude can make mistakes.

frames.subtitle: And then it says here Claude can make mistakes.
frames.subtitle_translated: And then it says here Claude can make mistakes.

frames.subtitle: And it says due to prompt injection risks only use it with code you trust.
frames.subtitle_translated: And it says due to prompt injection risks only use it with code you trust.

frames.subtitle: And it says due to prompt injection risks only use it with code you trust.
frames.subtitle_translated: And it says due to prompt injection risks only use it with code you trust.

frames.subtitle: All right.
frames.subtitle_translated: All right.

frames.subtitle: And then when you first start Claude in a particular project, it's going to ask you if you trust the files in the folder.
frames.subtitle_translated: And then when you first start Claude in a particular project, it's going to ask you if you trust the files in the folder.

frames.subtitle: Yes, I do.
frames.subtitle_translated: Yes, I do.

frames.subtitle: Yes, I do.
frames.subtitle_translated: Yes, I do.

frames.subtitle: So just try asking it about your current project.
frames.subtitle_translated: So just try asking it about your current project.

frames.subtitle: So just try asking it about your current project.
frames.subtitle_translated: So just try asking it about your current project.

frames.subtitle: And this is good if you ever start work on a project that you've not worked on before.
frames.subtitle_translated: And this is good if you ever start work on a project that you've not worked on before.

frames.subtitle: It could be your friends or colleagues.
frames.subtitle_translated: It could be your friends or colleagues.

frames.subtitle: You can just say, can you provide me with a summary of what this project is and press enter.
frames.subtitle_translated: You can just say, can you provide me with a summary of what this project is and press enter.

frames.subtitle: And you can see right now it's reading different files.
frames.subtitle_translated: And you can see right now it's reading different files.

frames.subtitle: And you can see right now it's reading different files.
frames.subtitle_translated: And you can see right now it's reading different files.

frames.subtitle: It's looking at the codebase.
frames.subtitle_translated: It's looking at the codebase.

frames.subtitle: So you can see it's a simple blog application built as a starter project for a claude code crash course which is pretty cool.
frames.subtitle_translated: So you can see it's a simple blog application built as a starter project for a claude code crash course which is pretty cool.

frames.subtitle: So you can see it's a simple blog application built as a starter project for a claude code crash course which is pretty cool.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這樣你們就能看到，這是一個簡單的部落格應用程式，作為一個課程的起點專案，Claude Code 課程很棒。

frames.subtitle: I think it's a nextjsbased web application that serves as a practical learning platform for AI assisted development.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我覺得這是一個基於 Next.js 的網頁應用程式，作為一個 AI 輔助開發的實用學習平台。

frames.subtitle: I think it's a nextjsbased web application that serves as a practical learning platform for AI assisted development.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我覺得這是一個基於 Next.js 的網頁應用程式，作為一個 AI 輔助開發的實用學習平台。

frames.subtitle: Now, personally, I like to see the code that I'm working on as Claude or any other coding tool makes changes to it because then I can easily check any edited or new code and also go into the weeds myself to work on the code manually when I want to or need to.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我個人喜歡看到我正在運作的程式碼，無論是 Claude 或其他編碼工具做出的修改，這樣我才能輕鬆檢查已編輯或新增的程式碼，也能深入研究手動編碼。

frames.subtitle: So, for this series, I'm going to be running Claude Code in the terminal within VS Code.
frames.subtitle_translated: 在這個系列中，我將在 VS Code 的終端機中執行 Claude Code。

frames.subtitle: And when we run the Claude command inside here, Claude is automatically going to install the Claude Code extension for VS Code.
frames.subtitle_translated: 當我們在裡面執行 Claude 指令時，Claude 會自動安裝 Claude Code 擴充功能到 VS Code。

frames.subtitle: And that allows it to integrate more seamlessly within the editor by adding a few extra features like diff viewing, adding text selection as context, um some keyboard shortcuts, and also active tab awareness so that Claude can see exactly what file we're working on.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這讓它能更無縫地整合到編輯器中，增加一些額外的功能，例如差異檢視、將文字選取作為上下文、一些鍵盤快捷鍵，以及活動分頁的感知，讓 Claude 知道我們正在處理哪個檔案。

frames.subtitle: Now, if the extension doesn't automatically get installed, then you can manually install it by coming to the extensions tab and searching for Claude Code.
frames.subtitle_translated: 如果擴充功能沒有自動安裝，你們可以手動安裝，前往擴充功能分頁並搜尋 Claude Code。

frames.subtitle: Anyway, I've got that same Shinobi project open in VS Code, which is the project I'm going to be working on for the duration of this course.
frames.subtitle_translated: 總之，我已經在 VS Code 中開啟了同一個 Shinobi 專案，這就是我將在整個課程中使用的專案。

frames.subtitle: And the first thing I'm going to do is run the project by opening the new terminal over here and then typing npm rundev.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我要做的第一件事是執行專案，開啟這裡的新終端機，然後輸入 npm rundev。

frames.subtitle: That's going to spin up a local dev server.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這將啟動一個本地開發伺服器。

frames.subtitle: So, we can preview this thing in a browser using localhost port 3000.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這樣我們就可以在瀏覽器中使用本機主機 3000 埠預覽這個東西。

frames.subtitle: So, then on the homepage, we've got two buttons right here.
frames.subtitle_translated: 所以，在首頁，我們有兩個按鈕在這裡。

frames.subtitle: One to go to the blog and one to go to the preview page for new UI components.
frames.subtitle_translated: 一個是前往部落格，另一個是前往新的 UI 元件預覽頁面。

frames.subtitle: So, if we go to the preview page, first of all, you can see that I've already added a few different things to this page like headings, regular text, button components, etc.
frames.subtitle_translated: 如果我們前往預覽頁面，首先，你們可以看到我已經在這個頁面新增了一些不同的東西，例如標題、普通文字、按鈕元件等等。

frames.subtitle: And during this course, I'm going to get Claude Code to make some more reusable UI components for me and then add them to this page so that we can preview them before we use them in the actual project.
frames.subtitle_translated: 在這個課程中，我要讓 Claude Code 為我建立一些更可重複使用的 UI 元件，然後將它們新增到這個頁面，以便我們在實際專案中使用它們之前預覽它們。

frames.subtitle: Now, if we go back and then go to the blog section, we can see a really simple blog design where we list out a bunch of blogs and they're all coming from High Graph, which is a headless CMS, and also a sidebar over here with some dummy data inside it.
frames.subtitle_translated: 如果我們返回，然後前往部落格區，我們可以看到一個非常簡單的部落格設計，我們列出了一堆部落格，它們都來自 High Graph，這是一個無頭 CMS，還有一個側邊欄在這裡，裡面有一些虛擬資料。

frames.subtitle: There's also a light and dark mode, which we can toggle with this little icon in the header.
frames.subtitle_translated: 也有淺色和深色模式，我們可以使用標題中的這個小圖示來切換。

frames.subtitle: So, this is the project we're going to be working on with Claude Code, but you can use whatever project that you want.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這是我們將與 Claude Code 一起使用的專案，但你們可以使用任何你們想要的專案。

frames.subtitle: It doesn't really matter.
frames.subtitle_translated: 這真的沒有關係。

frames.subtitle: What I would say is to begin with, make sure it's a throwaway project in case things go horribly wrong or at least use version control so you can get rid of any unwanted changes.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我會說的是，首先確保這是一個可丟棄的專案，以防萬一事情變得非常糟糕，或者至少使用版本控制，讓你移除任何不想要的變更。

frames.subtitle: All right, so before we move on and start doing any real work with Claude Code, I just want to set up a few things.
frames.subtitle_translated: 好的，在我們繼續並開始使用 Claude Code 做任何實際工作之前，我想先設定一些東西。

frames.subtitle: First, I'm going to use a special command Claude Code gives to us, which is forward slash terminal setup.
frames.subtitle_translated: 首先，我要使用 Claude Code 給我們的特殊指令，也就是斜線 terminal setup。

frames.subtitle: And when we run this command, it's going to install the shift plus enter keybinding for new lines when we're chatting with Claude code.
frames.subtitle_translated: 當我們執行這個指令時，它會安裝 shift 加上 enter 鍵的快捷鍵，讓我們在與 Claude Code 聊天時可以換行。

frames.subtitle: So if you wanted to start a new line in the chat window, you'd press shift and enter.
frames.subtitle_translated: 如果你想在聊天視窗中開始新的一行，就按 shift 和 enter。

frames.subtitle: Next, to make sure I don't end up wrecking this starter project, I'm going to ask Claude to switch to a new branch called Claude edits.
frames.subtitle_translated: 接下來，為了確保我不會毀掉這個起步專案，我要請 Claude 轉換到一個新的分支，叫做 Claude edits。

frames.subtitle: And Claude can do this, by the way.
frames.subtitle_translated: 而且 Claude 可以做到這一點。

frames.subtitle: It has knowledge about your local git repository and it can run bash commands to do things like stage and commit changes, switch branches, merge branches, and even resolve conflicts.
frames.subtitle_translated: 它了解你的本地 git 儲存庫，並且可以執行 bash 指令來做一些事情，像是分段和提交變更、切換分支、合併分支，甚至解決衝突。

frames.subtitle: And you can also ask it about commits or branches or changes made between commits.
frames.subtitle_translated: 你也可以詢問它關於提交或分支或提交之間變更。

frames.subtitle: And you can also ask it about commits or branches or changes made between commits.
frames.subtitle_translated: 你也可以詢問它關於提交或分支或提交之間變更。

frames.subtitle: Anyway, when we tell it to do any of these things, it's going to show us the bash command it wants to run and ask us for permission to run it.
frames.subtitle_translated: 總之，當我們告訴它做其中任何事情時，它會顯示它想要執行的 bash 指令，並詢問我們是否允許它執行。

frames.subtitle: We'll say yes for now to let it run that command and then we'll end up on that new branch so that we can start making some edits.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我們現在就說「是」讓它執行該指令，然後我們就會在新的分支上，這樣我們就可以開始做一些編輯了。

frames.subtitle: So now we've got cla uh claude code installed, configured, and ready to go inside VS Code.
frames.subtitle_translated: 所以現在我們已經安裝、設定好，並且準備好在 VS Code 裡使用 cla uh claude code 了。

frames.subtitle: In the next lesson, we're going to start making some actual code edits, and we'll also talk about adding memory to Claude using a claude.md file.
frames.subtitle_translated: 在下一個課程中，我們將開始做一些實際的程式碼編輯，我們也會討論如何使用 claude.md 檔案為 Claude 增加記憶體。

frames.subtitle: And by the way, if you want early access to the entire course, you can get it now on the net.dev site.
frames.subtitle_translated: 順便一提，如果你想要獲得整個課程的早期存取權，你現在可以在 net.dev 網站上獲得它。

frames.subtitle: So I will leave this link down below the video.
frames.subtitle_translated: 我會將這個連結放在影片下方。

frames.subtitle: You can buy the course for $3 or if you want you can sign up for a Net Ninja Pro subscription which is just $9 a month and for that you get access to all of my courses.
frames.subtitle_translated: 你可以購買這個課程，價格是 3 美元，或者如果你想要，你可以訂閱 Net Ninja Pro 訂閱，每月只要 9 美元，這樣你就可以獲得存取我所有課程的權利。

frames.subtitle: You get early access to every course as well plus access to my premium masterclass courses too.
frames.subtitle_translated: 你也可以獲得所有課程的早期存取權，以及存取我的高級 masterclass 課程。

frames.subtitle: So the first month is half price when you use this promo code down here and I will leave this link down below the video so you can go ahead and sign up.
frames.subtitle_translated: 使用這個 promo code，第一個月份是半價，我會將這個連結放在影片下方，讓你前去註冊。

frames.subtitle: So the first month is half price when you use this promo code down here and I will leave this link down below the video so you can go ahead and sign up.
frames.subtitle_translated: 使用這個 promo code，第一個月份是半價，我會將這個連結放在影片下方，讓你前去註冊。

frames.subtitle: Heat.
frames.subtitle_translated: 熱。

frames.subtitle: Hey, Heat.
frames.subtitle_translated: 喂，熱。

result.ai_outline:
## Claude Code Tutorial #1 - Introduction & Setup 影片分析

**1. 影片摘要:**

本影片為 Claude Code 系列教程的第一集，主要介紹了 Claude Code 的基本概念、安裝步驟，以及如何在 VS Code 中使用它。影片也講解了如何與 Claude Code 互動，並利用它來分析和生成程式碼。最後，影片預告了後續課程將會介紹如何利用 Claude Code 來自動化程式碼審查和解決問題。

**2. 關鍵重點:**

*   **Claude Code 概述:** Claude Code 是一個在終端運行、由 Anthropic 開發的 AI 輔助編碼工具，與 Copilot 等工具不同，它直接在終端運行，可更緊密地集成到開發流程中。
*   **安裝與帳戶設定:**  影片示範了如何在 Windows 和 macOS 上安裝 Claude Code，以及如何選擇合適的帳戶方案（Pro 或 Max）。
*   **VS Code 集成:**  Claude Code 可以通過安裝 VS Code 擴展來與 VS Code 整合，提供更方便的編輯體驗，例如 diff 檢視和文本選取為上下文功能。
*   **Git 集成:** Claude Code 具有 Git 知識，可以執行 Git 命令，例如切換分支和提交更改。
*   **未來方向預告:**  後續課程將會介紹如何利用 Claude Code 來增加記憶體（Claude.md 文件）和自動化程式碼審查。

**3. 詳細大綱:**

**0:00 - 0:30 影片介紹 & Claude Code 概述**

*   介紹 Claude Code 的作用：分析、規劃、編寫、編輯程式碼
*   與其他 AI 編碼工具的區別：在終端運行，更緊密的開發流程整合
*   介紹 Claude Code 的優點：更深入地理解專案程式碼，生成更適用的程式碼

**0:30 - 2:30 安裝 Claude Code & 帳戶設定**

*   介紹 Claude Code 的官方網站和 npm 命令
*   Windows 和 macOS 的安裝步驟
*   介紹 Pro 和 Max 帳戶方案的價格和功能
*   說明如何使用 Pro 方案，並連接帳戶

**2:30 - 4:30 在 VS Code 中使用 Claude Code**

*   說明如何啟動 Claude Code session
*   介紹首次使用時的配置：選擇 Dark Mode，登入帳戶
*   說明如何與 Claude Code 互動，並詢問專案資訊
*   說明 Claude Code 自動安裝 VS Code 擴展

**4:30 - 6:00 Git 集成 & 分支管理**

*   介紹 Claude Code 的 Git 知識
*   示範如何使用 Claude Code 執行 Git 命令，例如切換分支
*   強調安全性和確認命令的重要性

**6:00 - 7:00 VS Code 集成 & 專案預覽**

*   說明如何使用 `npm rundev` 啟動本地開發伺服器
*   介紹專案的結構和功能，例如部落格和 UI 組件預覽
*   說明未來課程將會介紹如何使用 Claude Code 生成 UI 組件

**7:00 - 7:30 後續課程預告 & 額外資源**

*   預告後續課程將會介紹如何增加記憶體 (Claude.md 文件)
*   介紹 Net Ninja Pro 訂閱的優點和價格
*   提供 Net Ninja Pro 的訂閱連結和促銷碼
